author: Austen Goslin
title: Don’t expect the year’s delayed blockbusters to pop up on streaming
description: Some of 2019’s biggest blockbusters have been delayed. But from No Time to Die, to Black Widow, to Mulan, to Wonder Woman, don’t expect those movies to skip theaters in favor of streaming services.
content: Movie theaters are in the middle of the most tumultuous time for business in a century. Thanks to social distancing intended to slow down the spread of the COVID-19 pandemic, theaters all over the United States and all over the world have been closing their d… [+9926 chars]
